description: This Dart source file defines a Flutter widget for a 'Wishlist' page in a mobile app. It manages rendering a list of wishlist items, including UI layout, state management with Provider, and interactions such as removing items.

classes.name: WishlistPage
classes.description: A StatefulWidget representing the wishlist page, which displays wishlist items in a grid and allows interaction such as removing items.

classes.name: _WishlistPageState
classes.description: The state class for WishlistPage, manages initialization and building the widget.

methods.name: initState
methods.description: Initializes the widget state, scheduling a refresh of wishlist items after the first frame.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds the widget tree for the wishlist page, including layout, loading indicator, and grid of items.
